data.data: Initial comments:This report is the result of an unannounced onsite complaint investigation (CHL21C843A) completed on December 27, 2023, at Heritage Valley Beaver.  It was determined that the facility was in compliance with the requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 PA Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998. Plan of Correction: Initial comments:This report is the result of an unannounced onsite complaint investigation (CHL21C843A) completed on December 27, 2023, at Heritage Valley Beaver. Initial comments:This report is the result of a Department of Human Services, Chapter 5100 Mental Health Procedures Act Survey conducted on December 20, 2023, at Heritage Valley Beaver.  It was determined the facility was in compliance with requirements of the Chapter 5100 Mental Health regulations. Plan of Correction: Initial comments:This report is the result of a Department of Human Services, Chapter 5100 Mental Health Procedures Act Survey conducted on December 20, 2023, at Heritage Valley Beaver.
